name: Try to seize me
description: Play with your friends. Cops and robbers work to take each other out. The game is focused around playing with friends. Robbers use traps to take out cops while cops use their trusty baton!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Future releases may require more hard drive space.
